jobs.title: Research Analyst
jobs.description:
**About us**
Blue Spiral Motion is a purpose-driven company seeking to promote and democratise personal development. We are harnessing the power of Technology to help people improving their lives and reach their full innate potential to create a better World. Our approach combines personal self-care with positive social and environmental impacts.

And we are interested in connecting with purpose-driven people too! 

**Role Description **
Are you passionate about Self-development? Do you have any interest in Mental Health, Holistic Well-being, Wellness and Alternative medicine and therapy? Would you like to empower people to take care of their well-being?

We are looking for an enthusiastic, pro-active, curious, resourceful, and committed research analyst to join us. You will be in charge of: 
* Performing researches on issues that are facing people to access well-being therapy;
* Performing researches about wellbeing therapies, the benefits and the scientific studies which back them;
* Building relationships with Non-profits, Universities and Scientists dedicated to Wellness, Well-being and Mental Health;
* Developing and conducting user surveys;
* Documenting all data and research procedures;
* Monitoring Trends in the Wellness Industry;
* Blogging about the latest trends and development in well-being / Wellness and alternative therapy;

●Key skills required: 
* Diploma in Psychology, Journalism, Digital health, Mental Health, Wellness or wellbeing (or in any other relevant area)
* English to a Native level 
* Great autonomy / Self-starter able to work confidently with minimum supervision 
* Good writing skills
* Good analytics skills 
* Good organisation skills
* Good communication skills
* Attention to details and accuracy
* Inquisitive mind 
* Consistent methodology
* Professionalism, Ethics and confidentiality

● Nice to have:
* Interest in writing / blogging about wellbeing 
* Interest in Mental health, Digital Health / Wellness & Wellbeing ….
* Interest in pursuing a career in the Wellness Industry
* Be creative regarding Self-care 

**What We Offer**
This is an unpaid internship however, we can offer:
* An opportunity to work in a Startup environment
* Gain connections and develop your professional skills in a booming industry 
* Grow your expertise in Wellness
* A reference and testimonial to further your professional career
* Exposure for your blog articles
* Remote work and Flexibility

If you feel that you meet the criteria, please drop us an email. To apply, please send your CV or LinkedIn profile and a supporting statement outlining your interest in the internship position and explaining why you are a good fit. 

Duration: 3 months – Immediate start
